# Satoshi Font Files

Place your Satoshi font files in this directory with the following naming convention:

- `Satoshi-Light.woff2` (weight: 300)
- `Satoshi-Regular.woff2` (weight: 400)
- `Satoshi-Medium.woff2` (weight: 500)
- `Satoshi-Bold.woff2` (weight: 700)

You can also include `.woff` versions as fallbacks:
- `Satoshi-Light.woff`
- `Satoshi-Regular.woff`
- `Satoshi-Medium.woff`
- `Satoshi-Bold.woff`

## Where to get Satoshi font:

Satoshi is a premium font available from:
- [Fontshare](https://www.fontshare.com/fonts/satoshi) (free for personal/commercial use)
- [Fontspring](https://www.fontspring.com/fonts/satoshi)
- Other font marketplaces

Once you add the font files, the app will automatically use Satoshi throughout.
